DOC.criteria: ) Confirm voluntary participation agree purpose study sign date IC two way ; b ) Being male , age 18 55 year old clinically healthy ; c ) BMI ≥ 18.5 ≤ 30. ) Participation clinical trial 12 month precede survey ; b ) Presence pulmonary disease , cardiovascular , neurological , endocrine , gastrointestinal , genitourinary system ; c ) acute illness period 07 day begin study ; ) determine Chronic administration medication , hypertension , diabetes require continue use drug ; e ) Hemoglobin < 13 g / dL ; f ) Continuous use oral anticoagulant , platelet inhibitor antiinflammatory ; g ) Use medication interact heparin ( see Section 7.8.1 ) ; h ) history gastrointestinal bleeding , deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolism ; ) History coagulopathy bleeding diathesis ; j ) Presence bruise physical examination . k ) Changes skin subcutaneous tissue place injection make ( eg liposuction abdomen ) . l ) absolute platelet count 100 x 109 / L ; ) A history acute haemorrhage last 30 day ; n ) history sensitivity biological product derive mammalian albumin component formulation ; ) history allergy major disease Steven Johnson ; p ) History present use least 12 month tobacco ; q ) current previous history ( le 12 month ) illicit drug use ;
